statements: SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_metrics WHERE energy_rating > 75;
SELECT building_name, architect_name FROM energy_efficiency_metrics WHERE energy_rating BETWEEN 50 AND 75;
SELECT MAX(energy_rating) AS max_energy_rating FROM energy_efficiency_metrics;
SELECT building_id, building_name, energy_rating FROM energy_efficiency_metrics ORDER BY energy_rating DESC;
SELECT building_name, energy_rating FROM energy_efficiency_metrics WHERE architect_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_metrics WHERE energy_rating > 50;
SELECT building_name, energy_rating FROM energy_efficiency_metrics ORDER BY energy_rating DESC;
SELECT architect_name, building_name FROM energy_efficiency_metrics WHERE energy_rating BETWEEN 30 AND 70;
SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_metrics WHERE building_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT AVG(energy_rating) AS average_rating FROM energy_efficiency_metrics;
SELECT * FROM Architects;
SELECT architect_name, email FROM Architects;
SELECT architect_name, phone_number FROM Architects WHERE architect_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM EnergyEfficiencyMetrics WHERE metric_value > 0.5;
SELECT metric_name, metric_description FROM EnergyEfficiencyMetrics WHERE architect_id = 3;
SELECT architect_id, architect_name, email FROM Architects WHERE architect_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Architects WHERE architect_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT metric_name, metric_description FROM EnergyEfficiencyMetrics WHERE metric_value > 0.8;
SELECT architect_id, architect_name, phone_number FROM Architects ORDER BY architect_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyEfficiencyMetrics em JOIN Architects a ON em.architect_id = a.architect_id;
SELECT * FROM Building;
SELECT building_name, architect_name FROM Building;
SELECT building_name, energy_rating FROM Building WHERE energy_rating > 5;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT building_name, carbon_emission FROM Building JOIN CarbonFootprint ON Building.building_id = CarbonFootprint.building_id;
SELECT building_name, architect_name, energy_rating FROM Building;
SELECT building_id, building_name, energy_rating FROM Building WHERE energy_rating > 80;
SELECT b.building_name, e.date, e.energy_usage FROM Building b LEFT JOIN EnergyConsumption e ON b.building_id = e.building_id;
SELECT b.building_name, c.date, c.carbon_emission FROM Building b INNER JOIN CarbonFootprint c ON b.building_id = c.building_id;

SELECT b.building_name, e.date, e.energy_usage, c.date, c.carbon_emission FROM Building b LEFT JOIN EnergyConsumption e ON b.building_id = e.building_id INNER JOIN CarbonFootprint c ON b.building_id = c.building_id;
SELECT * FROM buildings;
SELECT building_name, construction_year FROM buildings ORDER BY construction_year DESC;
SELECT architect_name, expertise_area FROM architects WHERE expertise_area='Sustainable Design';
SELECT project_name, completion_date FROM projects WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, energy_consumption, energy_generation FROM projects JOIN energy_metrics ON projects.project_id = energy_metrics.project_id;
SELECT * FROM buildings WHERE construction_year > 2000 ORDER BY building_name ASC;
SELECT architects.architect_name, architects.expertise_area, projects.project_name FROM architects INNER JOIN projects ON architects.architect_id = projects.architect_id;
SELECT building_name, construction_year FROM buildings WHERE energy_rating > 4 ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, energy_consumption, energy_generation FROM projects JOIN energy_metrics ON projects.project_id = energy_metrics.project_id WHERE carbon_footprint < 200 ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT architect_name FROM architects;
SELECT * FROM building_designs;
SELECT architect_name, construction_date FROM building_designs ORDER BY construction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_materials WHERE material_type='Concrete';
SELECT architect_name, energy_rating FROM building_designs WHERE energy_rating > 4.5;
SELECT architect_name, company_name FROM architect_profiles;
SELECT * FROM building_designs;
SELECT architect_name, construction_date FROM building_designs WHERE energy_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM architect_profiles WHERE years_of_experience > 10 ORDER BY company_name ASC;

SELECT b.building_id, b.energy_rating, e.energy_usage FROM building_designs b LEFT JOIN energy_consumption e ON b.building_id = e.building_id WHERE e.consumption_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY e.energy_usage DESC;

SELECT bd.architect_name, bm.material_name, em.metric_name FROM building_designs bd JOIN building_materials bm ON bd.building_id = bm.material_id JOIN sustainability_metrics em ON em.metric_value > 0.8 ORDER BY em.metric_value DESC, bm.material_name ASC;
